pr_title: chore: update processing log exists msg from info to warn (MINOR)

timeline.message: chore: update processing log exists msg from info to warn (MINOR)

timeline.bodyText: The value of this field is currently true in all cases, but given the generic name KafkaTopicExistsException I thought it'd be less confusing to add the extra field than assume that all instances of KafkaTopicExistsExceptions represent partition or replication factor mismatches.
timeline.author: vcrfxia
